# Python MCP Server - Windows Theme Toggle

## Project Overview
Python MCP (Model Context Protocol) server that provides tools to toggle Windows theme between light and dark modes.

## Technology Stack
- Python 3.10+
- MCP SDK for Python
- Windows Registry manipulation (winreg)

## Development Guidelines
- Use type hints for all function parameters and return values
- Follow PEP 8 style guidelines
- Include error handling for registry operations
- Test on Windows 10/11 systems only
